jobTitle: Automotive Sales up to $9,000 sign on bonus

company.name: Huntington Beach Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram

description:
Automotive sales

Auto sales are increasing and now is the perfect time to consider a career in auto sales with Huntington Beach Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram. No experience needed, we will train.

Job Description

  • Completing extensive training regarding the product line. (Chrysler, Jeep, Dodge & Ram)
  • Spending time with customers to determine their needs and discusses vehicle options
  • Follow up with customers indicating purchasing interest through our website

Signing Bonus

  • Up to $9,000 sign on bonus is based on selling 15 cars per month for three months in a row.
  • 90 day waiting period and then the signing bonus will be paid.

Benefits Include

  • Paid Training
  • Great pay plan!
  • Paid Vacation
  • Medical / Dental / Vision
  • 401(k)

Qualifications

  • Valid in-state driver's license.
  • Must be willing to work evenings, nights, and weekends
  • Must pass the pre-employment test such as background and drug test

To apply online, please complete an employment application at www.hbjeep.com
